refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.subtitle: Cerita Senja Cafe
refundPolicy.introduction: We at Cerita Senja Cafe are committed to providing the best products and services. This policy explains the situations where refunds may be granted.
refundPolicy.eligibleConditionsIntro: You are entitled to request a refund if you experience any of the following conditions:
refundPolicy.cancelledByCafe: • Order Cancelled by Cafe: If we cannot fulfill your order due to out-of-stock ingredients or other technical reasons, we will provide a full refund (100%).
refundPolicy.wrongOrIncomplete: • Wrong or Incomplete Order: If you receive incorrect items or if items are missing from your order, we will provide a refund for the value of the problematic items.
refundPolicy.poorQuality: • Poor Product Quality: If the product you receive is proven to be unfit for consumption (e.g., spoiled or damaged), we will provide a full refund after verification.
refundPolicy.nonEligibleIntro: Refunds will not be provided for the following conditions:
refundPolicy.changeOfMind: • Change of Mind: If you change your mind after the order has entered the "Preparation" stage.
refundPolicy.thirdPartyDelivery: • Third-Party Delivery Service Issues: We are not responsible for problems caused by delivery drivers you ordered, such as late delivery, food damage during transit, or lost orders after being picked up from the cafe.
refundPolicy.notPickedUp: • Order Not Picked Up: If you choose the "Self Pickup" method but do not pick up your order before the cafe's operating hours end.
refundPolicy.contactUs: • Contact Us Immediately: Report your issue within a maximum of 24 hours after receiving the order via email at cerita@senja.id or phone at 085175003172.
refundPolicy.provideEvidence: • Provide Evidence: You must include the order number and clear photos as evidence of the condition (e.g., photos of incorrect or damaged items).
refundPolicy.verification: • Verification: Our team will verify your report within 1-2 business days.
refundPolicy.refundProcess: • Refund Process: If approved, the refund will be processed via bank transfer to your account within 3-5 business days.
refundPolicy.contactInfo: For all questions regarding this policy, please contact our support team via email at cerita@senja.id or phone at 085175003172.
